title: AI in the Enterprise, Powered by Snapdragon
text:
AI is no longer a future vision—it’s here, reshaping the way businesses operate.

In this webinar, Qualcomm’s expert panel uncovers how Snapdragon’s on-device AI is helping enterprises cut costs, accelerate workflows, and unlock agentic AI that goes beyond the cloud. You’ll hear how Snapdragon’s Neural Processing Unit delivers fast, efficient, and secure AI right on the device, opening the door to smarter sales, better customer support, and seamless content creation.

This isn’t theory—it’s practical, proven, and happening now. Panelists will share case studies, success stories, and innovations that show the measurable impact of on-device AI in real business environments.

You’ll also discover how Qualcomm’s thriving partner ecosystem—spanning text, video, knowledge, and generative AI tools—amplifies what enterprises can do with Snapdragon.



SPEAKERS:



Manish Sirdeshmukh, Gaming Platforms, PC SW Ecosystem, Qualcomm

Ramesh Balasubramanian, Senior Director, IT at Snapdragon, Qualcomm

Kevin Chung, Chief Strategy Officer, Writer

MODERATOR: Darrell Etherington, VP, SBS Comms
